snippet: As falling oil prices have ripped through energy stocks this year, five U.S. corporate spin-offs in the sector have not escaped the share price carnage and face a tougher road to recovery than more-established companies....

headline.print_headline: Oil Spin-Off Stocks Could Face Longer Road to Recovery
headline.main: Oil Spin-Off Stocks Could Face Longer Road to Recovery

lead_paragraph: As falling oil prices have ripped through energy stocks this year, five U.S. corporate spin-offs in the sector have not escaped the share price carnage and face a tougher road to recovery than more-established companies.
